info.name: Userstyles - Large Edit On Focus v.4
info.description: Enlarge the Edit Textarea when you give it the FOCUS (when you click INSIDE). It return to the previous size when you click outside. An Enlarge Icon appear on hover it (Icon from: WPZOOM Developer's pack).
